attorneys.attorney_name: Asst United States Attorney Br-Mag Duty

charges.charge_description: 21 USC 841 &; 846; Knowingly and intentionally possess with the intent to distribute approximately 8.84 kilograms of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance and persons known and unknown did knowingly and intentionally enter into an agreement to knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute approximately 8.84 kilograms of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance, that is the object of the conspiracy.
